original_text: Remember that our God is like a fire. He destroys everything that is not good. Remember that our God is like a fire. He destroys everything that is not good.

sentences.original_text: Remember that our God is like a fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님은 불과 같다는 것을 기억하라.

sentences.original_text: He destroys everything that is not good.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 좋지 않은 모든 것을 멸망시킨다.
